title: Is Opening Schools Safe? (with Graham Stringer MP)
itunes:title: Is Opening Schools Safe? (with Graham Stringer MP)
description:
Boris Johnson is doubling down on his commitment to open all English schools in September. Graham Stringer, Labour MP for Blackley and Broughton, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Caroline Hepker why his party should be more enthusiastic about the proposal.


Plus, as a new survey finds one in three British businesses plans to cut staff this quarter, Stephen Phipson of manufacturers' organisation MakeUK explains why ending furlough in October is a mistake.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
